; Yang Yingqi. The interviewees confessed

;

; Starting in September 2023, Yang Yingqi and her team made a bold attempt in Chenghua District, Chengdu: 23 of the 83 communities were selected for gradual participation planning. The only criterion for screening is attitude, "the community secretary must be changed from the inside."

;

; This is one of the series of the fourth series of "Chengshi · Cheng Painting" Chenghua District Community Planning and Design Festival. Yang Yingqi explained to the secretary of the community party committee who participated in the competition that the gradual participation plan was to continue to try and correct errors to make a community gradually move towards a better direction.

;

; As a community creator, this is the fifth year of "post -95" Yang Yingqi. Cheng Cheng, who is active in the public governance atmosphere in the community, is not a small number of "professional players" like her. They are responsible for formulating community action plans.

;

; In Yang Yingqi's view, community builders are more like the companion and deep cultivators of the community.

;

; Yang Yingqi accompanied the participating team to complete the entire process. From the training ability of the preliminary secretary, to the discussion of round tables with the backbone of the secretary, and then to the backbone call for residents to do participation and voting, and select community issues. Then perform two -way blind selection to match the volunteer designer team. "All are controlled by small physical quantities, 100,000 yuan, but we have to solve a problem or contradiction in the community, or let the community have a point to glow."

;

; For Yang Yingqi The results of the game are not the most important. More importantly, in the process of participation, people's awareness of the community and inspiring the enthusiasm for public governance of community residents, "grassroots governance should be seen most."

;

; One of the contestants, Zhu Xiangling, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of Shuanglin Community, is particularly impressed. At the discussion stage of the round table that week, there were almost 100 people who participated in almost every day. Most of them were residents, as well as community builders, planners, grid members, community and street office staff. "Before we didn't know how to leverage various resources, it seemed that everyone felt that this was a cross -border thing. It was actually not. Everyone had a common goal to make this environment better."

;

; Following the possibility of solving the problem, the "wall competition" is at this time into the attention of the participants. Master Jiang, who was repairing the car for a long time, occupied a public space in the community. Zhu Xiangling said that like Master Jiang, the entire community is also distributed a lot. They provide personalized services and survive in public contradictions. However, residents have denied this method of banning. "People have been here for two or three decades here, and the craftsmanship is good, and it provides good services. Why do people ban people?"

;

; They started thinking, can the two be symbiotic? As a result of the "shared wall and surface", it gradually became full.

;

; Yang Yingqi appreciates the temperature and flexible treatment of the Shuanglin community. In order to solve a community contradiction, there is no new contradiction. The car repair master who works hard can still maintain a living, and can also provide services to the community residents. Sharing ladders, hammers, pliers and other tools.

;

; Zhu Xiangling was also impressed by Yang Yingqi's team. In the contact at the beginning of the event, Zhu Xiangling observed that the team ran through the entire Chenghua District to visit the investigation. She recalled that the little girl also brought the secretary and the "special forces" visited the friendly community of the people created by the team before.

;

;这是杨迎琦带着团队扎根成都的重要项目，也是她“对于成都整个有信心的原因”。 Three years ago, the project landed on the Bilei community. She met the community in charge for the first time and talked to 11 o'clock at night, and decided to cooperate immediately. Yang Yingqi felt that the managers of this community were tolerant and appealing, and they were also willing to continue to introduce youth forces. "I think this is the most needed energy for community secretaries. I call it endogenous power."

;

; She likes Beilei communities. She is a shop when she is on the street. The residents are living on the street. The shop provides the service of the entire community. The price is cheap, the life is comfortable, there is no large viaduct, and there are no wide highways. It is more suitable The dominance scale of urban residents.她愿意回到这样的地方，将新活力注入到老城区中。

;

; In the Beilei community, in response to the contradiction between people and dogs who are more concentrated, Yang Yingqi team helped formulate a friendly convention and complete the construction of the community's pet community. The spontaneous operation of the community has no longer needed coordination and guidance.

;

; Two months ago, she was building a basketball court for a village, and her funds were insufficient. A wonderful thing happened: friends in the friendly community of people learned about this and took their children to raise funds on the street. The merchants in the community also deliberately contributed their own products as a gift for fundraising.

;

; She sighed: "If in the grass -roots governance, when we make people and people have value recognition, when condensed into some strength, they can help people in other places. This good will continue to expand And glowing. "

;

; Time clockwise allocated for another five years. The new Chengdu native of Chengdu who moved with his family since his childhood, with the sense of weakness of the public welfare industry, chose this profession. She wants to find a link between people in the urban community. In her understanding, the "community" is not an administrative division or a community concept. It means the community. .

;

; So in the early days of each project, Yang Yingqi was looking for such links, looking for the community of this place, and exploring the real needs of the community. In the south, there were projects for villagers' courtyard renovation with 700,000 yuan. Before the Yang team took over, five sets of courtyards had been transformed. The designer entered the venue directly, did not negotiate and respect, and the effect was counterproductive. The owner was very dissatisfied.

;

; After Yang Yingqi took over, she told the villagers that she could not obtain the decoration fund for free and need to pay 2,000 yuan, which is the fee paid to the young designer.她要求每一位户主参与到整个建设过程中，设计师与户主同吃同住15天。她还要求各家降低庭院围墙高度，尽量透明化。 "The entire village does not have high walls, and it is not the appearance of small households. It will form the concept of a large family in the entire community." This common creation model was promulgated by the Asia -Pacific Office of the United Nations Agency in 2021. "2021 Asian Metropolis Landscape Award".

;

; This creation concept has been running through. In this gradual participation planning action in Chenghua District, the core theme is community motivation, which is inseparable from "community cultivation" and "community growth power". Yang Yingqi's "community cultivation" is to combine "from bottom to bottom" with "top -down". When the community ability is still insufficient, it is appropriately incorporated into external forces. A degree of intervention.

;

; Out of interest, Zhu Xiangling also participated in the training course of the community creator. In her understanding, the key step of "building" is to dig out the owner's consciousness of the community residents: "I think community construction should be the participation of diversified subjects, reaching a consensus on a public problem, and more resources to solve the corresponding problems. After the solution, it is also necessary to empower it. In the end, the two -way change of people and the environment. It is not only a change in hardware, but also changes in everyone. "
